name: Only One Life (Sepi)
description:
PLAYER READY? YOU'RE IN A STORMY SITUATION! An asteroid minefield, SHOOT AND EVADE YOURSELF TO YOUR HIGHEST SCORE, as you maneuver your space shuttle!

But what if the biggest minefield comes from your phone notifications?!!

Your main character is playing this smartphone minigame and you on your PC. Sit back, relax and shoot your way through! Make sure to avoid as many problems (asteroids*) as you can!

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD to move

SPACE to shoot

MOUSE to close notifications

  

Made for the GJL Game Parade Summer 2021 jam, THEME: ONE TIME USE

This game is brought to you by:

Game Developer & Designer: Sepi

Music : Leonardo Muller-Rodriguez

YOUTUBE

SPOTIFY

SFX : Boris Saint-Pierre

Instagram: @boris_saint_pierre
